longDescription.value: A collection of simple, customisable reusable react-native components with a decent amount of functionality out of the box. I don't use this package anymore tbh. I've found that it's really quick to create components on a per project basis and the customisability of that vs the convenience of using this package outweighs the latter.7

shortDescription.value: A collection of simple, reusable React-Native components.
